name: wehavemagnums
text: I find that the cut-off photograph adds heavily to the pathos of this strip.

name: rothenbergxxx
text: Hey, well put.

name: softerworld
text: especially as the camera is called 'SureShot'

name: ghostd
text: Beautifully sad.

name: halofyre
text: also that he manages to smile through his sadness, to create a happy memento.

name: spectre
text: Yeah, happy, he just learned he'll be a widower in  a few weeks, he's off the hook as a husband and dad, one he puts the seeds in a nursery.

name: sargasm
text: This is the saddest thing.  If I was a crying person, this arc would have done the trick.

name: deancain29
text: crying now

name: tomsmith
text:
Liebot, what is the saddest thing?
The Achewood strip from 15th October 2002.

name: lizjones
text: The flower even seems to look up at him lovingly.

name: tetrisattack
text: This strip and the ones with child Roast Beef are as funny as they are sad.

name: songbirdspectre
text: my heart.  it hurts. :(

name: pwb
text: A comment left by pwb was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, thesyndicate88, ddddbbbb, miaou)

name: cheeks_jd
text:
Just cause the camera is called sureshot, you think it's a beastie boys reference?

Dude that's a stretch. But so sweet if it's true.

name: antiboy
text: Canon has a brand of digital cameras called "Sure Shot".

name: joeyramoney
text: SNIF :(

name: f1shst1ck
text: I love his little tux

name: pa_ass_nts
text: One day, this photo will be the only memory of Petunia Philippe has

name: cailetshadow
text: Philippe will always remember that kind of pointy...blurry green...thing that was in the corner of the photo.

name: missbee
text: When he is an old, senile man of Five.

name: hyetal
text: Philippe is a rad husband.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: Lie Bot was right, tuxedos do photograph better.

name: bordello
text: I wonder if Lie Bot ignored it's programming, just this once, to allow Phillipe to look snazzy in his wedding picture.

name: waddlerz
text: Frame 5=Priceless Philippe

name: ddddbbbb
text: this is precious!

name: gobot
text: dang, reading this and listening to modern romance can really bring on the depression.

name: anticitizen
text: listening to "modern romance" and doing anything is a sure fire way to get very depressed.

name: semiquaver
text: A polaroid photo from a Canon digital camera?  Damn...I mean, yeah it is more poignant that way.  I only just noticed it.  Sorry if that ruins it for any person.

name: pzukowski
text: I'm sure of the artist lord cartoonist had a Polaroid camera around for reference, he would have used it.

name: semiquaver
text: Yeah.  I mean...yeah.  I feel like a dick.

name: tom-ba
text: A Polaroid from a Canon Sureshot makes it better for me.

name: rowboat
text: What a thing to notice at a time like this. For shame.

name: serf
text: phil's gotta learn the life lessons the hard way.

name: scott_335
text: My favorite little story arc.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Every strip that has Philipe in it always makes me googly-eyed.

name: carlyle
text:
You can't see it, but he is most likely crying.
And it is heartbreaking.

name: tragicone
text: This, truly is the saddest thing.

name: sevenslashfour
text: This is so cute it hurts :(

name: robocop
text: Phillipe's smile and the way he holds his hands in the photo always makes me feel good. i've returned to it more than once.

name: landowmpg
text: Philippe, there's some pi on your back!
